q1: I see the Italian soccer jerseys everywhere, they must be a popular team.
a1: Of course ... they have some excellent players and a great record on the world stage.
q2: Is the Italian soccer team are the best in the world?
q3: According to records they have a great win to lose ratio
a3: Will Italy play against the US anytime soon?
q4: Unlikely. The US are not big in international soccer.
q5: Can Italy bet it's biggest rival?
a5: I think Italy normally struggles against England but I don't think they will play them anytime soon.
